Name: Cribl
Author: Cribl - tap@Cribl.io
Description:
- Review the solution [Release Notes](https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/blob/master/Solutions/Cribl/ReleaseNotes.md)

Cribl is a leading observability platform that provides automatic and intelligent observability at scale for cloud-native and enterprise workloads; with Cribl Application Security, your DevSecOps teams can resolve security issues faster, accelerating software delivery.
Integrating Cribl with Microsoft Sentinel enables DevSecOps teams to detect, prioritize, triage, and remediate attacks rapidly. DevSecOps teams benefit from the high-accuracy threat signals Cribl surfaces. It helps them avoid time-consuming investigation activities, freeing them up for more critical tasks.
Microsoft Sentinel data connectors poll Cribl for new [attacks, vulnerabilities, audit logs](https://www.Cribl.com/platform/application-security/), and [problem events](https://docs.Cribl.com/docs/shortlink/davis-ai-landing).

**Included data connectors:**
- **Attacks**, Common attacks on application layer vulnerabilities which can be detected and blocked using Cribl, like SQL injection, command injection, and JNDI attacks.
- **Runtime vulnerabilities**, Software vulnerabilities detected throughout all layers of the application stack.
- **Audit logs**, Security-relevant events for a Cribl tenant.
- **Problems**, AI-powered observability problems raised across cloud and hybrid environments.

[Learn More about Cribl](https://www.Cribl.com/) | [Cribl Docs](https://docs.Cribl.com/docs)
WorkbookBladeDescription: This solution installs workbooks. Workbooks provide a flexible canvas for data monitoring, analysis, and the creation of rich visual reports within the Azure portal. They allow you to tap into one or many data sources from Microsoft Sentinel and combine them into unified interactive experiences.
